segments.text: I'm watching this woman and I'm really starting to feel annoyed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she be so completely engrossed in polishing a plate?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her kitchen sink is practically a waterfall, overflowing onto the floor!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a significant puddle right under her feet, and she doesn't even flinch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's beyond just being focused; it's a complete lack of awareness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And she's oblivious to the children, who are clearly getting into trouble behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That boy is practically inviting an accident, teetering on that stool for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone really needs to step in and point out the obvious hazards.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a dangerous situation for everyone in that room.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This level of detachment is frankly quite irresponsible.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just want to walk in there and turn off that faucet myself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sheer waste of water alone is irritating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her calm demeanor in the face of such chaos is truly perplexing.
segments.speaker: PAR
